text: Bengt Robert Holmström (born 18 April 1949) is a Finnish economist. He is the Paul A. Samuelson Professor of Economics at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. With Oliver Hart, he received the Central Bank of Sweden Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences in 2016. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Economists Category:Finnish Nobel Prize winners Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology faculty Category:Scientists from Helsinki Category:Stanford University alumni Category:Yale University faculty
title: Bengt Holmström
